title: Frictional forces on cars rounding a corner

content.question:
A car with speed v and an identical car with
 speed 2v both travel the same circular section of
 an unbanked road. If the frictional force required
 to keep the faster car on the road without skidding
 is F, then the frictional force required to keep the
 slower car on the road without skidding is
